TitleIndex: Portfolio about Angular, Ionic, Java and Unity | David, a Full Stack Developer
TagKeywordsIndex: Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain, Job, Engineer, Engineering, Technology, Angular, Ionic, Java, Unity, Engine, Node.js, Bootstrap, Spring, Programming, JavaScript, C Sharp, C#
TagDescriptionIndex: Author: David Martinez Ros; Location: Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain; Job: Engineer, Engineering; Technology: Angular, Ionic, Java, Unity; Engine: Node.js, Boostrap, Spring; Programming: JavaScript, C Sharp, C#.
Section1Text1: I'm David, a Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in software engineering at all levels.
Section1Text2: I have more than 14 years of professional experience and 6 years of university training, where I have studied computer engineering and multimedia engineering.
Section1Text3: I have participated in large projects of leading companies in Barcelona, such as the Pompeu Fabra University, the Generalitat de Catalunya, the Diputación de Barcelona, the Banco de Sabadell and Grifols, among many others.
Section1Text4: Do you need help for your project?
Section1Text5: If we look for the definition of creativity in the wiki, we will see that "... is the ability to generate new ideas or concepts, new associations between ideas and known concepts, which usually produce original solutions ... ".
Section1Text6: <u>I offer an idea:</u> "use engineering to find the original solution ".
Section1Text7: All my experience and my high levels of creativity make me a versatile, proactive, original and decisive person. I do not fear complex challenges, on the contrary, I am passionate about solving riddles.
Section1Text8: I publish all my works in my git repository.
Section2Text4: Angular, Ionic, JSP, Servlet, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, Javascript
Section2Text14: Maven, Git, npm, ng, Postman, Soap-UI

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer en Universidad Pompeu Fabra

description.value: Formo parte del equipo de Administración Electrónica de la Universidad Pompeu Fabra, donde resuelvo las incidencias del día a día del departamento y hago desarrollos relacionados con Documentum, Firma Electrónica y Administración Electrónica.

Realización de proyecto de digitalización electrónica con Angular 4 y Spring-Boot 1.5. Consiste en diseño y documentación de la aplicación, subida de documento, visualización de documento pdf, firma y validación con Java Web Start (sin applets) y, finalmente, descarga de documento resultante firmado.

Realización de proyecto de Certificados Académicos Personales con Angular 4 y Spring-Boot 1.5. Consiste en Autenticación con VALid, selección de certificado a descargar, pago con TPV y enviamiento por email del certificado.

Diseño y desarrollo de herramientas de firma con certificado de Sello de Órgano (a través de Digital Signature Service - DSS), validación y completación de firma electrónica (a través del consorcio AOC) en formatos XAdES y CAdES Detached y PAdES Enveloped.

Desarrollo de WebService SOAP de Registro de Entrada de Facturas y Registro de Evidencias en Elogs con Spring 4.3.3, Hibernate 5.2.2, CXF 3.1.10, Quartz 2.2.1 en Java 1.8 (posiblemente, en el futuro implemetaré el Registro de Salidas de Facturas).

experiences.title: Analista Programador en Diputació de Barcelona

description.value: Realización de desarrollos e incidencias con las tecnologías Java, Spring, PL/SQL y Web Services.
Creación de cliente Web Service Soap.
Cambios en la arquitectura del sofware de una máquina de pipetado y muestreo de pruebas de sangre, para funciona, demás, con una nueva máquina.
Realización de proyecto de consultas dinámicas en Java y extracción en diferentes salidas en aplicación hecha en Spring, con el objetivo de explotar la base de datos de contratos de Mc Mutual.

experiences.title: Analista Programador en Generaltat de Catalunya

description.value: Desarrollo como Analista Programador especializado en Java, PL/SQL, Ajax, HTML, CSS, Java EE, Spring, MVC, Swing, Java Web Start.
Realización de generación de árbol a partir de un XML con un patrón XSL.
Realización de aplicación web para maquetar niveles de Registros Sanitarios.
Creación de motor de consultas dinámico con Spring.

experiences.title: Coordinador de departamento en Banco Sabadell

description.value: Coordinador del departamento EIFEL, que soluciona los errores de la plataforma que desarrolla la facturación electrónica de los clientes (4 personas a cargo).
Desarrollo de herramienta de gestión interna para los dos departamentos de facturación electrónica.

projects.html:
In this example you can learn step by step to program your first web page.

The steps are very well defined and it is easy to follow.

In a couple of days you can have your project prepared.

You can make the example in the following tutorial .

I have developed my website with angular 4 using angular / Cli .

It is a responsive website with bootstrap 3 .

Projects are done with angular , unity , java or ionic .

projects.titol: Associate json file to html table
projects.html:
This example is developed with Angular-Cli .

It's an example that loads a JSON file into an html table with an Angular-Cli Service.

Here at davidlearns.blogspot.com You can see the explanation of the example and you can learn to do it.

This example is developed with Angular-Cli .

Show some animations in html components that you can use in Angular2 web pages.

The code that inspired my project is https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/.

This project is developed with Angular-Cli .

Show a tree component loaded from a json file with an ancestor and children structure.

This project is developed with Angular-Cli .

Show some div components loaded from a json file with title, content and styles.

These divs are draggable and dropables and you can use them with the app-div-node component.

This project shows the weather forecasts of any municipality in Spain in the next four days.

Use a configurable widget made by AEMET .

If you're interested in this project, contact with me to improve the product and make it commercial!

This example shows a 3D scene with some cubes that you can click and these change color and the camera follows them.

The cubes are on the X axis and, when you click them, they propagate on the axis Z. The same thing happens when we click on the Y axis.

This example needs the libraries gl-matrix. js and litegl.js to run.

This project is a remake of the Snake game that became very famous in the late 90s in mobile Nokia and others.

In this version, you can move the snake in a 3D scene, a cube on X, Y and Z axes that you can capture to make the snake grow.

This project needs the libraries gl-matrix.js and litegl.js to run .

Working on it!

This example shows an imaginary futuristic landscape of the first inhabitant living on Mars.

Pure science fiction and fantasy.

In this example you can move the camera by dragging the mouse and, with the arrow pointing upwards of the keyboard.

You will throw the ball that will collide with the cube and the action will change the material of the two objects.

This project is a 'remake' of the game Ghost'n Goblins taking advantage of the new technologies.

My collaborators will be Jordi Via and Xavi Guerrero .

Soon it will be here!

projects.titol: Two cameras of the same scene
projects.html:
This example shows the screen divided in half.

On the left side, we find a perspective camera that follows the character, always behind him.

On the right side, we find a 'multiporpuse' camera that follows the character, recovering the position always behind him.

This example shows a Dragon generated with the Blender 3D modeling tool that we can obtain in free3d.com .

This Dragon has animations created in Blender and I used one of them in the keyboard event.
This example shows a terrain with abrupt textures and inside a small lake.
This is a comparison between AngularJS and Angular2, with the Google application Trends .

projects.titol: Comparison: VR and the PlayStation4 and XBox 360 game consoles
projects.html: This is a comparison between VR (Virtual Reality) and Video Consoles PlayStation4 and XBox 360 .
This project wants to investigate and find which are the topics that interest the world.
This is a comparison between the concepts that cohabit in the IA (Artificial Intelligence) .

This project is done in Java 8 with Spring Boot 1.5 and Angular 4 with Bootstrap 3 .

It consists of 5 parts:
  • Calling the Internet
  • File Generator
  • User and knowledge management
  • Myyme Website
  • Learning Deep Learning
Working on it!

This project will be developed with Ionic , Java 8 with Spring Boot 1.5 and Tensor Flow .

The objective is for the mobile to take a photograph of a monument and the Application shows a description of the photograph.

Coming soon!
